data.title: Watch live Melga vs Cienciano Vuelta: What time do you watch TV and watch channels at Copa Sudamericana 2022?
data.meta_description: After 1-1 in the first leg, the team comes out for victory to win a ticket to the group stage of the international tournament.Check out all the details.
data.text:
Melga vs Cienciano Live. ' Domino will receive a 'dad' for the 2022 Copa Sudamericana Phase 1 round at the UNSA Stadium in Arequipa on Tuesday, March 15 today. Everything starts at 7:30pm in Peru on the DIRECTV signal in South America (see details below). In this note, you can follow the qualifying matches on a minute-by-minute basis.

Minute-by-minute real-time events

Melga: Carlos Caseda, Alejandro Ramos, Alec Deneumostier, Paolo Reina, Matthias Lazo, Martin Perez Gedes, Horacio Orzan, Alexis Arias, Bernardo Cuesta, Christian Bordakahar, Luis Iberico

Substitutes for Melga: Cabejudo, Cabrera, Archimbo, Onkoi, Figueroa, Tandazo, Sanchez, Caceres, Quevedo, Galeano, Luzan, Vidales

Scientists: Miguel Vargas, Alexis Cosio, Jose Estrada, Paolo Fuentes, Luciano Ricalde, Angel Romero, Carlos Beltran, Nicolas Rinaldi, Kevin Sandoval, Danilo Carando, Adrian Ugariza.

Alternatives to Cienciano: Ramirez, Vardales, Kuruchet, Guerrero, Quintana, Juvchuk, Perleche, Ivanez, Duran, Aparicio, Barbieri, Carpio

Melga VS Cienciano Preview

In the first leg, the score ended with 1-1, so who: the winner is international, regardless of the score Advance to the group stage of the tournament.If you tie it up, you will go to a shootout for a penalty.Be careful: There is no longer a double away goal.Anything can happen in St. Augustine.

This week there will be 16 qualifiers. It should be noted that at this stage of the competition, clubs from the same country will play. For example, in the other keys of Peru there will be Sports Boys and Ayakucho FC, and on Wednesday 16 they are playing at the National Stadium. ' Rosados' is about to return to 2-0 of the first leg.

Since Melga spent the weekend in a duel against Alianza Lima for Match Day 6 of Liga 1 2022, she will receive enormous support from his people. A good framework can help with the mood for running Copa Sudamericana matches.

Against the 'white', 'Rosin Gross' returned to victory after 1-0 with Jean-Pierre Arquimbo. The locals played three matches without knowing the victory. They arrive in time for an international duel.

Cienciano will want to force Melgar to play his game so as not to be surprised If you get ahead on the scoreboard, you will end up falling into the despair of your opponents because they are not at all or not at all in the so-called 'White City' of Peru.

In 2003, to win the tournament and repeat their feat, Cuque√±os came out with a 1-1 match against Universitario at the Ate Monument Stadium. And they did so with the goal of Ecuadorian midfielder Fernando Guerrero. It was a golden point.
